Class HSSFColumnShifter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.helpers.BaseRowColShifter

  • @Beta
public final class HSSFColumnShifter
extends ColumnShifter
    Helper for shifting columns up or down
    Since:
    POI 4.0.0

      • updateHyperlinks

        @NotImplemented
public void updateHyperlinks(FormulaShifter formulaShifter)
        Description copied from class: BaseRowColShifter
        Shift the Hyperlink anchors (not the hyperlink text, even if the hyperlink is of type LINK_DOCUMENT and refers to a cell that was shifted). Hyperlinks do not track the content they point to.
        Specified by:
        updateHyperlinks in class BaseRowColShifter
        Parameters:
        formulaShifter - the formula shifting policy
